text: Eligio “Kika” de la Garza, II (September 22, 1927March 13, 2017) was an American politician. He served as the Democratic representative for the 15th congressional district of Texas from January 3, 1965, to January 3, 1997. De la Garza died on March 13, 2017 in McAllen, Texas from kidney failure, aged 89. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Texas Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Texas Legislature
title: Kika de la Garza
